review: October Sky is such an excellent movie. This is one of them movies that families can watch together. October Sky is such an inspirational movie. If you set your mind to something and never give up then your dreams can come true. This movie might not have done good in theaters but it deserves praise. The acting was excellent. This is my favorite fact based movie of all times. I recommend this movie to anyone who has a dream. I also recommend this movie to anyone who loves a good fact based, family movie. you wont be disappointed.
